<!-- ## Course Learning Outcomes -->
1. Describe activities and responsibilities of professional engineers.
2. Demonstrate professional problem solving methodology and facility with estimation.
3. Apply basic mechanics principles to analysis of mechanical/aerospace engineering.
4. Work in collaborative teams to analyze engineering problems.
5. Experience engineering by using CAD modeling software, dissecting devices and examining how they function.
6. Gain basic, hands-on knowledge of Raspberry Pi hardware with Python programming language.
7. Gain insight on sesnors and automation and, edge computing strategies with the Raspberry Pi.
8. Implement one Raspberry Pi-based measurement and automation system.
